community.title: NAMI Southwest Ohio
community.description: We offer understanding to anyone concerned about mental illnesses and the treatment of mental illness.

community.title: MindPeace
community.description: Support groups are designed to bring members with the same issues together in order to share coping strategies and empower members with a sense of community

community.title: Somatic Resource Therapy
community.description: Support your observation skills, and intervention ability to work in the present with physical sensation and movement to enhance cognitive and emotional processing,especially trauma and PTSD
community.address: 951 W. North Bend Rd. Suite 3-A Cincinnati, OH 45224

community.title: Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) Skills
community.description: 24-week commitment during which you will learn mindfulness, distress tolerance, emotion regulation, and interpersonal effectiveness skills.
